mapper.select: /* api.common.menu.getAllMenuList */ SELECT A.MENU_CD ,A.DEL_YN ,A.MENU_NM ,A.UPPR_MENU_CD ,A.MENU_TYP_CD ,A.MENU_CFCD ,A.MENU_LEV ,A.MENU_DTEXT ,A.SORT_NO ,A.MENU_DISP_YN ,A.ICON FROM TB_MENU A WHERE 1=1 AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND MENU_DISP_YN = 'Y'
/* api.common.menu.getAuthMenuList */ SELECT A.AUTH_CD ,A.MENU_CD ,A.SELECT_YN ,A.INSERT_YN ,A.UPDATE_YN ,A.DELETE_YN ,A.EXCEL_YN FROM TB_AUTH A WHERE 1=1 AND A.AUTH_CD = #{authCd}
